name: Coding Simulator (Ji9sw)
description:
Want to code in real life but don't have enough brain cells?

Introducing:

Coding Simulator

Code in game easily and earn Marks, without leaving your seat

_____________________________________________________

Update Log:

RELEASE V1.0.0

General, Finally, I'm back after forgetting about this game for 4 months, this game was pretty much finished and its been in development for almost a year on and off, I've finally come back to eliminate all the bugs, finish the content, and make more updates

In-game coding, Fixed a bug where you can type multiple times at once and make heaps of money, press space to code faster

UI, fixed an issue with scaling, fixed the settings menu, added the credits menu, added click sounds (a bit broken)

Whiteboard, fixed the ordinal system

Shop, completely redid the shop system, things are now cheaper, there's 2 new parts

Navigation, added text to show how to change areas or whatever

 for other updates please head to the Pastebin

_____________________________________________________

Coding Simulator is in a Early stage, please do not treat things bad when they have are on the road to being improved.

You can find earlier versions of the game here

I'll warn you that the WEBGL version (browser) has worsened performance and graphics, and the most recent version of Coding Simulator may not be released for it
